meanings.definition: A man whose wife has committed adultery.
meanings.sent1: The cuckolded man felt betrayed by his unfaithful wife.
meanings.sent2: The community gossiped about the cuckolded husband.
meanings.sent3: The cuckolded man's friends tried to cheer him up with jokes.
meanings.sent4: Being a cuckolded husband felt like a punch to his pride.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cuckolded man haunted his thoughts.

meanings.definition: To make a cuckold of (a husband).
meanings.sent1: She cuckolded her husband by having an affair with his friend.
meanings.sent2: The deceitful woman cuckolded her spouse without remorse.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cupid seemed to enjoy cuckolding unsuspecting husbands.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal cuckolded him, leaving scars on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The act of cuckolding shattered their marriage beyond repair.
